```{r, echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}

library(infographiq)
```

```{r}
tryCatch(plot_timeseries(
csv_tv  = "https://github.com/mhepner90/RVC/blob/master/exploited_species/exploited_fk_bio.csv",
title   = "Black Grouper biomass",
y_label = "biomass",
skip    = 0,
filter  = "SPECIES_CD == \"MYC BONA\"",
col_t   = "year",
col_y   = "biomass"),
error = function(e) e)
```
